title: Ice cream : manufacturing sales volume in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2009 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in thousand liters, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2013.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2012 to 2009.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013 to 2012.
gold: During 2018 , the sales volume of ice cream manufactured in the UK amounted to approximately 328 million liters . From 2013 to 2014 , sales fell by over a hundred million liters and have not recovered since . Before this decline , sales were rather stable at over 420 million liters .
